description.narrative: This activity (Stabilisation Unit Security and Justice) is a component of Stabilisation Unit Security and Justice reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £874,999. This component benefits Developing countries, unspecified, and works in the following sector(s): Security system management and reform. , with the following implementing partners: Coffey International Development, Crown Agents Limited, UK - Ministry of Defence. The start date is 01-04-2010 and the end date is 31-03-2011.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA
